message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. Let me know what you think!
Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only commit to a maximum of $13,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $13,000 is a good offer, I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price.  How about we settle on $13,500? This would allow us both to walk away feeling good about the deal.
Alice, I've reviewed your latest offer and am willing to consider $13,200. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while staying within my budget.
